name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cadabra - Maximize Email Efficiency With AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save countless hours reading, writing, replying, and reviewing emails with the magic power of AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using GPT 4.0 the most advanced AI yet. Cadabra magically summarizes lengthy email threads, writes intuitive replies, and suggests grammatically sound responses in seconds...making you effortlessly more efficient.
 
Cadabra even learns your writing style over time to compose or reply to messages that sound just like you! 
 
⚡ Provides concise email thread summaries 
⚡ Auto generates email replies 
⚡ Makes grammar and sentence suggestions
⚡ Writes with a personalized tone
 
➤ Summarize Full Email Threads
Need the Coles notes version? Cadabra automatically summarizes lengthy email threads for you and presents you with the "need to know" details so you can get the back story without getting bogged down in paragraphs of pleasantries and chit-chat.

➤ Write Emails Faster
Cadabra will automatically compose replies for you, saving you the headache of email formatting and composition. All that's left to do is review for accuracy and hit send. No need for formal replies? Use the handy quick-reply feature for your most casual and repetitive responses.
 
➤ Get Every Sentence Right
Not happy with the composition? Rephrase specific sentences with a click of a button, or try this handy feature out on your own replies.  

➤ Nail The Tone
Over time, Cadabra will learn your writing style and language preferences to automatically generate replies that sound just like you.

Bottom line? Save time and make your workday more productive to get you out of the office sooner. 
 
Check us out at trycadabra.io
 
We have lots of exciting features coming and consistently listen to your feedback on what features to release next! Have questions or feedback? Send us an email, or have Cadabra do it at help@trycadabra.io.
